name: Alolan Exeggutor
author: Hasuno
flavor_text: Alola is the best environment for this Pokémon. Local people take pride in its appearance, saying this is how Exeggutor ought to look.

attacks.name: Exeggutor’s Paradise
attacks.effect: For each of your Benched Exeggcute, search your deck for an Alolan Exeggutor or Alolan Exeggutor-GX and put it onto that Exeggcute to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Draco Meteor Barrage
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each {G} Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.
